text: Dr Lui is very patient, kind and compassionate during the sessions that I had with him. He gave me insightful advice and solutions to tackle my problems which proved useful and practical. Dr Lui creates a safe and welcoming space which is conducive to the therapeutic sessions that I had. Overall, I feel that seeing Dr Lui has made an effective improvement to my mental wellbeing.

Was attended by Dr Lui and I’m greatly appreciative of his advice, I was able to get an answer to something I’ve worried about for years. I feel he was able to get to the root cause of my problem and he also triggered many “AHA” moments for me. :)
I do not recommend coming to this clinic. The prices here are super expensive. Moreover, lui does not listen well and does not understand my situation.
Dr Lui Yit Shiang is an exceptionally helpful and kind Dr.
